idea-plugin.name: JavaScript Support
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin supports JavaScript, ActionScript and TypeScript languages. The following features are supported:
  • Dedicated file types.
  • Syntax and error highlighting.
  • Inspections, intention actions and quick fixes.
  • Dedicated pages under the Code Style node of the Settings/Preferences dialog.
  • Code folding and formatting.
  • Navigation and search.
  • JavaScript-specific refactorings.

group.description: Select JavaScript libraries to be used with the current file
